description.p: This API allows its users to retrieve financial information provided to the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) by public companies using the XBRL global standard technical syntax. Submitted XBRL information is read by the system, converted to a format which is optimized for query (as opposed to XBRL which is optimized for information exchange), and stored in a database in that queriable format. Additional metadata is added to the system which is commonly used when querying this financial information. Please note that only financial information provided within SEC forms 10-Q and 10-K is provided via this system.

Information can be retrieved about entities, the submissions made by those entities, the components contained within those submissions, the model structure of a component, or the facts reported within a component. All information is provided in the following formats: JSON (the default), XML, CSV, and Excel.

For more information about using this system, you can download this Excel spreadsheet which contains working examples. Also, this getting started guide is helpful in understanding the information provided by this system.

Please note that information outside of the DOW30 can only be accessed using a valid token that can be retrieved by creating an account on http://www.secxbrl.info and login is done using the Session API.
Also note, that the POST method can be simulated by using GET and adding the _method=POST parameter to the HTTP request.
Please keep in mind that URLs are case sensitive. That is, all parameters need to be provided as shown in the documentation.

method.summary: Retrieve information about all or a selection of entities

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: A CIK number

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: A ticker symbols

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns query listing.

example.title: Retrieve a specific entity
example.description: Retrieve information about a specific entity identified by its CIK. Return the result as JSON.

example.title: Retrieve all entities
example.description: Retrieve information about all entities. Return the result as XML.

example.title: Retrieve information about all DOW30 entities
example.description: Retrieve information about all DOW30 entities. Return the result as CSV.

method.summary: Retrieve the filings of a particular entity

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: A CIK number

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: A ticker symbols

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The id of the filing

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns all filings for the given entity.

example.title: Retrieve the filings of a specific entity
example.description: Retrieve information about the filings of an entity identified by its CIK. Return the result as XML.

method.summary: Retrieve a summary for all components of a given filing

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: The tag to filter entities

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The id of the filing

parameter.name: cid
parameter.description: The id of a particular component

parameter.name: networkIdentifier
parameter.description: The network identifier of a particular component

parameter.name: disclosure
parameter.description: The disclosure to search for (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameter.name: reportElement
parameter.description: The name of the report element to search for (e.g. us-gaap:Goodwill)

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns all components for the given filing

example.title: Retrieve information about all components of a filing
example.description: Retrieve information about all components of a particular filing which is identified by its accession number. Return the result as JSON.

example.title: Retrieve information about all components of COCA COLA's latest 10-K
example.description: Retrieve information about all components of a particular filing which is identified by its accession number. Return the result as JSON.

resource.description: Retrieve a Fact Table for a Component

method.summary: Retrieve the fact table for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cid
parameter.description: The id of the component

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: networkIdentifier
parameter.description: The network identifier of a particular component

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameter.name: disclosure
parameter.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether or not to stamp facts for validity (default is false)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

parameter.name: additional-rules
parameter.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to the component's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameter.name: labels
parameter.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Return the fact table for the given component

example.title: Fact Table as CSV
example.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

example.title: Fact Table of Coca Cola's Q3/2013 Balance Sheet
example.description: Retrieve the fact table for the Balance Sheet of Coca Cola filing identified with accession number 0000021344-13-000050. Return the result as XML.

resource.description: Retrieve a business-friendly Spreadsheet for a Component

method.summary: Retrieve the business friendly Spreadsheet for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cid
parameter.description: The id of the component

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: networkIdentifier
parameter.description: The network identifier of a particular component

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameter.name: disclosure
parameter.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether or not to stamp facts for validity (default is false)

parameter.name: eliminate
parameter.description: Whether to eliminate empty rows/columns

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

parameter.name: additional-rules
parameter.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to the component's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Return the fact table for the given component

example.title: Fact Table as CSV
example.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

example.title: Fact Table of Coca Cola's Q3/2013 Balance Sheet
example.description: Retrieve the fact table for the Balance Sheet of Coca Cola filing identified with accession number 0000021344-13-000050. Return the result as XML.

resource.description: Retrieve a Model structure for a Component.

method.summary: Retrieve the model structure for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cid
parameter.description: The id of the component

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: The tag to filter entities

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: networkIdentifier
parameter.description: The network identifier of a particular component

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameter.name: disclosure
parameter.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Return the model structure for the given component

example.title: Model Structure as XML
example.description: Retrieve the model structure for a particular component. Return the result as XML.

example.title: Model Structure of Coca Cola's Q3/2013 Balance Sheet
example.description: Retrieve the model structure for a the Balance Sheet of Coca Cola filing identified with accession number 0000021344-13-000050. Return the result as XML.

resource.description: Retrieve a Fact Table for a Report

method.summary: Retrieve the fact table for a given report. Filters can be overriden. Filters MUST be overriden if the report is not already filtering.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of the entity

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: The tag to filter entities

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: The name of the report to be used (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Validate and stamp facts accordingly

parameter.name: labels
parameter.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Return the fact table for the given component

example.title: Fact Table for the Fundamental Accounting Concepts of COCA COLA's 2010..2013 10-K filings as CSV.
example.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

resource.description: Retrieve a business-friendly spreadsheet for a Report

method.summary: Retrieve the business-friendly spreadsheet for a report. Filters can be overriden. Filters MUST be overriden if the report is not already filtering.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of the entity

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: The tag to filter entities

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: The name of the report to be used (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameter.name: eliminate
parameter.description: Wwether to eliminate empty rows/colummns

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Validate and stamp facts accordingly

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Return the spreadsheet for the given report

example.title: Spreadsheet for the Fundamental Accounting Concepts of COCA COLA's FY 2010..2013.
example.description: Retrieve the spreadsheet for a particular report. Return the result as JSON, with eliminated empty rows/columns.

method.summary: Retrieve one or more facts for a combination of filings.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: The CIK of the entity

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: The ticker of the entity

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: The tag to filter entities

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The id of the filing

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameter.name: concept
parameter.description: The name of the concept to retrieve the fact for (alternatively, a parameter with name xbrl:Concept can be used).

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameter.name: map
parameter.description: [Deprecated, use report] The concept map that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameter.name: rules
parameter.description: [Deprecated, use report] The rules that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: The report to use as a context to retrieve the facts. In particular, concept maps and rules found in this report will be used. (default: none)

parameter.name: additional-rules
parameter.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to a report's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameter.name: labels
parameter.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

parameter.name: prefix:dimension
parameter.description: The name of a dimension used for filtering. Accepted format: prefix:dimension. As a value, the value of the dimension or ALL can be provided if all facts with this dimension should be retrieved

parameter.name: prefix:dimension::default
parameter.description: The default value of the dimension [prefix:dimension] that should be returned if the dimension was not provided explicitly for a fact. Accepted format: prefix:dimension::default

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

error.description: Bad request: a parameter is missing or invalid or total is used together with csv or excel serialization
Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns the fact listing

example.title: Retrieve us-gaap:Assets for DOW30
example.description: Retrieve the value of us-gaap:Assets for all DOW30 entities for the latest reported year. Bring in all data regardless of which characteristic. Return the result as JSON.

example.title: Retrieve us-gaap:Assets for DOW30 which relates to the root reporting entity only.
example.description: Retrieve the value of us-gaap:Assets for all DOW30 entities for the latest reported year which relates to the root reporting entity only. Return the result as JSON.

example.title: Retrieve fac:NetCashFlow for DOW30
example.description: Retrieve the value of fac:NetCashFlow (using the FundamentalAccountingConcepts map) for the DOW30 entities for the year 2011. Return the result as CSV.

method.summary: Retrieve the report elements contained in a set of filings.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The result format

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: A tag to filter

parameter.name: cik
parameter.description: A CIK number

parameter.name: ticker
parameter.description: A ticker symbols

parameter.name: sic
parameter.description: The industry group

parameter.name: fiscalYear
parameter.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameter.name: fiscalPeriod
parameter.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameter.name: aid
parameter.description: The id of the filing

parameter.name: onlyNames
parameter.description: Whether only the names of the report elements should be returned. If so, the values don't contain duplicates. (default: false)

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of the report element to return (e.g. us-gaap:Assets).

parameter.name: map
parameter.description: [Deprecated, use report] The concept map that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: The report to use as a context to retrieve the report elements. In particular, concept maps found in this report will be used. (default: none)

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: A search term to search in the labels of report elements (e.g. stock)

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session (if accessing entities beyond DOW30)

parameter.name: Content-Type
parameter.description: Content-Type of the request.

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns all names of the report elements in the selected filings.

example.title: Retrieve the the names of all report elements of COCA COLA's latest FY filing
example.description: Retrieve a set of names of report elements of COCA COLA's latest FY filing. Return the result as CSV.
